people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: Nowhere you can go is more peaceful, more free of interruptions, than your own soul. Retreat to consult your own soul and then return to face what awaits you.
people.subject: Negativity

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: Is a world without pain possible? Then don't ask the impossible.
people.subject: Negativity

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: Nowhere you can go is more peaceful, more free of interruptions, than your own soul. Retreat to consult your own soul and then return to face what awaits you.
people.subject: Negativity

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: Is a world without pain possible? Then don't ask the impossible.
people.subject: Others

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: Ask: What is so unbearable about this situation? Why can't you endure it? You will be embarrassed to answer.
people.subject: Others

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: To do harm is to do yourself harm. To do an injustice is to do yourself an injustice. It degrades you. You can also commit injustice by doing nothing.
people.subject: Others

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: It's silly to try to escape other people's faults. Just try and escape your own.
people.subject: Others

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: People exist for one another. You can instruct or endure them.
people.subject: Others

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: There have to be shameless people in the world. This person in front of you might just be one of them. Remembering that a whole class must necessarily exist will enable you to tolerate its members.
people.subject: Others

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: As an antidote to battle unkindness we were given kindness.
people.subject: Others

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: Choose not to be harmed and you won't feel harmed. Don't feel harmed, and you haven't been.
people.subject: Others

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: When you wake up in the morning, tell yourself: The people I deal with today will be meddling, ungrateful, arrogant, dishonest, jealous, and surly. They are like this because they can't tell good from evil. But I have seen the beauty of good and the ugliness of evil, and have recognized that the wrongdoer has a nature related to my own â€“ not of the same blood or birth, but the same mind, and possessing a share of the divine. And so none of them can hurt me. No one can implicate me in ugliness. Nor can I feel angry at my relative, or hate him. We were born to work together like feet, hands, and eyes, like the two rows of teeth, upper and lower. To obstruct each other is unnatural. To feel anger at someone, to turn your back on him: these are obstructions.
people.subject: Others

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: The only thing that isn't worthless: to live this life out truthfully and rightly. And be patient with those who don't.
people.subject: Others

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: After death there is no 'us' to suffer harm.
people.subject: Dying

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: Nature first invited you in and then sends you away. Before long, darkness. Make your exit with grace. The same grace shown to you.
people.subject: Dying

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: Accept death in a cheerful spirit, as nothing but the dissolution of the elements from which each living thing is composed. If it doesn't hurt the individual elements to change continually into one another, why are people afraid of all of them changing and separating? It's a natural thing. And nothing natural is evil.
people.subject: Dying

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: You could leave life right now. Let that determine what you do, say, and think.
people.subject: Dying

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: Your soul takes on the color of your thoughts.
people.subject: Advice

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: If it's endurable, then endure it. If it's not endurable, then stop complaining. Your destruct will mean its end as well.
people.subject: Advice

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: Do everything as if it were the last thing you were doing in your life.
people.subject: Advice

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: At some point you have to recognize what world it is that you belong to; what power rules it and from what source you spring; that there is a limit to the time assigned you, and if you don't use it to free yourself it will be gone and will never return.
people.subject: Advice

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: Keep before your eyes all those that experienced it before you, and felt shock and outrage and resentment at it. Where are they now? Nowhere.
people.subject: Failing

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: People who are excited by posthumous fame forget that those who remember them will soon die too.
people.subject: Failing

people.name: Marcus Aurelius
people.quote: Is it your reputation that is bothering you? But look at how soon we're all forgotten. The abyss of endless time that swallows all. The emptiness of all those applauding hands.
people.subject: Failing

people.name: Buddha
people.quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
people.subject: Mind

people.name: Buddha
people.quote: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
people.subject: Peace

people.name: Buddha
people.quote: Thousands of candles can be lighted from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not be shortened. Happiness never decreases by being shared.
people.subject: Life

people.name: Buddha
people.quote: Holding on to anger is like grasping a hot coal with the intent of throwing it at someone else; you are the one who gets burned.
people.subject: Us

people.name: Buddha
people.quote: Better than a thousand hollow words, is one word that brings peace.
people.subject: Peace

people.name: Buddha
people.quote: Better than worshiping gods is obedience to the laws of righteousness.
people.subject: Gods

people.name: Buddha
people.quote: Hatred does not cease by hatred, but only by love; this is the eternal rule.
people.subject: Love
